Prerequisite(s): One Radiant Dawn maneuver
Range: Melee or ranged attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

You strike out with a simple blow with an uncanny power to heal and harm. Make an attack. If it hits, it deals weapon damage as normal plus an additional [[1d6]] points of damage, and you can heal yourself and allies within close range (25 feet + 5 feet per 2 initiator levels) for a total number of hit points equal to three times your initiation modifier, divided as you choose between you and your allies. Alternatively, you may choose to grant a single ally within close range a saving throw against an ongoing eﬀect on them that oﬀers a saving throw to negate, at the eﬀect's original DC. If it succeeds, the eﬀect ends. This does not progress poison, diseases, or similar eﬀects on a failed saving throw. Essence: Each point of essence invested into this strike increases the total amount of healing done by 5 hit points. This healing is split up between targets normally.
